qa.title: What is the main goal of this planner?
qa.description: This planner helps you focus on five key goals to gradually achieve meaningful results across different areas of life.

qa.title: How many goals can I have at once?
qa.description: The optimal number of active goals is 5. This helps avoid overload and maintain focus.

qa.title: How many tasks can I add?
qa.description: You can add an unlimited number of tasks per goal, but no more than 20 tasks per day to maintain a healthy workload balance.

qa.title: How does the planner support motivation?
qa.description: The system tracks completed tasks and emphasizes achievements rather than failures, which helps reduce stress and increase motivation.

qa.title: Can I track my progress?
qa.description: Yes, the planner provides statistics for each goal and overall progress, helping you understand your pace and plan next steps.
